sentences.sContent: Even oranges don't eat the whole peel, but keep the pith , that white stringy stuff; it's packed with flavonoids.
sentences.sContent_eng: Even oranges don't eat the whole peel, but keep the pith , that white stringy stuff; it's packed with flavonoids.
sentences.sCn: 即使是桔子不能整个的连着皮吃，但至少保留精髓，即白色粘性的东西，它也含有黄酮类化合物。

synos.tran: 杀死；使瘫痪；除去…中的髓

words.tran: 有髓的，多髓的；精练的；简洁有力的

trans.tranOther: a soft white substance that fills the stems of some plants
